<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>false</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>false</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection/> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>OnCallEscalation</name> <order>100</order> <priority/> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[/** * This is the default escalation handler for on-call rotation escalations * * When it is called, the following variables are available: * * current - the document that is associated with the escalation (such as an incident) * escalation - the escalation record */
gs.include("OnCallRotation");
var eventName = escalation.event_name; var rota = new OnCallRotation();
rota.whoIsNext(escalation); while (rota.next()) { // Generate an event for each pending escalation if (rota.getType() == "device") { // Device notification gs.eventQueue(eventName + ".device", current, rota.getDevice(), rota.getPrimaryUser()); gs.print("Generated Group Device Event for: " + rota.getDevice()); } else { // User notification gs.eventQueue(eventName + ".user", current, rota.getUser(), rota.getUserName()); gs.print("Generated User Event for: " + rota.getUserName()); } rota.addCurrentToNotified(); } rota.continueEscalations(escalation);
]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>glide.maint</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2007-06-14 14:44:24</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path/> <sys_id>2aaa07a1c0a801670187f1f350554294</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>OnCallEscalation</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="On-Call Scheduling" source="com.snc.on_call_rotation">4bca78ec3cf1311068bcf327dfe37f86</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_2aaa07a1c0a801670187f1f350554294</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>glide.maint</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2008-03-11 21:34:08</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>action</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=2aaa07a1c0a801670187f1f350554294"/> </record_update>
